home.tagline: The intelligent way to manage your university class schedule, swap sections, and connect with classmates.

swapping.title: Class Swapping
swapping.description: Easily swap class sections with other students. Submit your request and get automatically matched with compatible swaps.

petitions.title: Section Petitions
petitions.description: Create petitions for new section openings. Gather support from other students and present united requests to administration.

communication.title: Easy Communication
communication.description: Connect with matched students via Telegram for seamless communication when arranging your class swaps.

step1.title: Create an Account
step1.description: Sign up with your university email and provide your Telegram username for contact.

step2.title: Submit Your Request
step2.description: Create a swap request or petition with your current and desired class sections.

step3.title: Get Matched & Connect
step3.description: Get automatically matched with compatible requests and connect via Telegram to arrange the swap.

petitions.title: Section Petitions
petitions.subtitle: Support and track petitions for new class sections

info.title: How Petitions Work
info.step1: Create or support a petition for a new class section
info.step2: When a petition reaches enough support, a formal request form is generated
info.step3: Submit the completed form to your department
info.step4: Track the status of your petition here

swapRequests.title: Class Swap Requests
swapRequests.subtitle: Submit and manage your class section swap requests
